results.rule_description: Missing description for security group.
results.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons
results.resolution: Add descriptions for all security groups

results.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons

results.rule_description: Instance with unencrypted block device.
results.impact: The block device could be compromised and read from
results.resolution: Turn on encryption for all block devices
results.description: Root block device is not encrypted.

results.rule_description: Instance with unencrypted block device.
results.impact: The block device could be compromised and read from
results.resolution: Turn on encryption for all block devices
results.description: Root block device is not encrypted.

results.rule_description: EBS volumes must be encrypted
results.impact: Unencrypted sensitive data is vulnerable to compromise.
results.resolution: Enable encryption of EBS volumes
results.description: EBS volume is not encrypted.

results.rule_description: aws_instance should activate session tokens for Instance Metadata Service.
results.impact: Instance metadata service can be interacted with freely
results.resolution: Enable HTTP token requirement for IMDS
results.description: Instance does not require IMDS access to require a token

results.rule_description: aws_instance should activate session tokens for Instance Metadata Service.
results.impact: Instance metadata service can be interacted with freely
results.resolution: Enable HTTP token requirement for IMDS
results.description: Instance does not require IMDS access to require a token

results.rule_description: An egress security group rule allows traffic to /0.
results.impact: Your port is egressing data to the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows egress to multiple public internet addresses.

results.rule_description: An egress security group rule allows traffic to /0.
results.impact: Your port is egressing data to the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows egress to multiple public internet addresses.

results.rule_description: An ingress security group rule allows traffic from /0.
results.impact: Your port exposed to the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress from public internet.

results.rule_description: An ingress security group rule allows traffic from /0.
results.impact: Your port exposed to the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress from public internet.

results.rule_description: Instances in a subnet should not receive a public IP address by default.
results.impact: The instance is publicly accessible
results.resolution: Set the instance to not be publicly accessible
results.description: Subnet associates public IP address.

results.impact: The instance is publicly accessible
results.resolution: Set the instance to not be publicly accessible

results.rule_description: User data for EC2 instances must not contain sensitive AWS keys
results.impact: User data is visible through the AWS Management console
results.resolution: Remove sensitive data from the EC2 instance user-data
results.description: Sensitive data found in instance user data: Check for AWS Access Key Id

results.rule_description: VPC Flow Logs is a feature that enables you to capture information about the IP traffic going to and from network interfaces in your VPC. After you've created a flow log, you can view and retrieve its data in Amazon CloudWatch Logs. It is recommended that VPC Flow Logs be enabled for packet "Rejects" for VPCs.
results.impact: Without VPC flow logs, you risk not having enough information about network traffic flow to investigate incidents or identify security issues.
results.resolution: Enable flow logs for VPC
results.description: VPC Flow Logs is not enabled for VPC

results.rule_description: EBS volume encryption should use Customer Managed Keys
results.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
results.resolution: Enable encryption using customer managed keys
results.description: EBS volume does not use a customer-managed KMS key.

results.rule_description: ECR repository has image scans disabled.
results.impact: The ability to scan images is not being used and vulnerabilities will not be highlighted
results.resolution: Enable ECR image scanning
results.description: Image scanning is not enabled.

results.rule_description: ECR images tags shouldn't be mutable.
results.impact: Image tags could be overwritten with compromised images
results.resolution: Only use immutable images in ECR
results.description: Repository tags are mutable.

results.rule_description: ECR Repository should use customer managed keys to allow more control
results.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
results.resolution: Use customer managed keys
results.description: Repository is not encrypted using KMS.

results.rule_description: EKS Clusters should have cluster control plane logging turned on
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for the EKS control plane
results.description: Control plane authenticator logging is not enabled.

results.rule_description: EKS Clusters should have cluster control plane logging turned on
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for the EKS control plane
results.description: Control plane controller manager logging is not enabled.

results.rule_description: EKS Clusters should have cluster control plane logging turned on
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for the EKS control plane
results.description: Control plane API logging is not enabled.

results.rule_description: EKS Clusters should have cluster control plane logging turned on
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for the EKS control plane
results.description: Control plane audit logging is not enabled.

results.rule_description: EKS Clusters should have cluster control plane logging turned on
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for the EKS control plane
results.description: Control plane scheduler logging is not enabled.

results.rule_description: EKS should have the encryption of secrets enabled
results.impact: EKS secrets could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Enable encryption of EKS secrets
results.description: Cluster does not have secret encryption enabled.

results.rule_description: EKS Clusters should have the public access disabled
results.impact: EKS can be access from the internet
results.resolution: Don't enable public access to EKS Clusters
results.description: Public cluster access is enabled.

results.rule_description: EKS cluster should not have open CIDR range for public access
results.impact: EKS can be accessed from the internet
results.resolution: Don't enable public access to EKS Clusters
results.description: Cluster allows access from a public CIDR: 0.0.0.0/0.

results.rule_description: Elasticsearch domain isn't encrypted at rest.
results.impact: Data will be readable if compromised
results.resolution: Enable ElasticSearch domain encryption
results.description: Domain does not have at-rest encryption enabled.

results.rule_description: Domain logging should be enabled for Elastic Search domains
results.impact: Logging provides vital information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for ElasticSearch domains
results.description: Domain audit logging is not enabled.

results.rule_description: Elasticsearch domain uses plaintext traffic for node to node communication.
results.impact: In transit data between nodes could be read if intercepted
results.resolution: Enable encrypted node to node communication
results.description: Domain does not have in-transit encryption enabled.

results.rule_description: Elasticsearch doesn't enforce HTTPS traffic.
results.impact: HTTP traffic can be intercepted and the contents read
results.resolution: Enforce the use of HTTPS for ElasticSearch
results.description: Domain does not enforce HTTPS.

results.rule_description: Elasticsearch domain endpoint is using outdated TLS policy.
results.impact: Outdated SSL policies increase exposure to known vulnerabilities
results.resolution: Use the most modern TLS/SSL policies available
results.description: Domain does not have a secure TLS policy.

results.rule_description: Load balancer is exposed to the internet.
results.impact: The load balancer is exposed on the internet
results.resolution: Switch to an internal load balancer or add a tfsec ignore
results.description: Load balancer is exposed publicly.

results.rule_description: IAM policy should avoid use of wildcards and instead apply the principle of least privilege
results.impact: Overly permissive policies may grant access to sensitive resources
results.resolution: Specify the exact permissions required, and to which resources they should apply instead of using wildcards.
results.description: IAM policy document uses sensitive action 'ec2:*' on wildcarded resource '*'

results.rule_description: IAM policies should not be granted directly to users.
results.impact: Complex access control is difficult to manage and maintain.
results.resolution: Grant policies at the group level instead.
results.description: One or more policies are attached directly to a user

results.rule_description: A KMS key is not configured to auto-rotate.
results.impact: Long life KMS keys increase the attack surface when compromised
results.resolution: Configure KMS key to auto rotate
results.description: Key does not have rotation enabled.

results.rule_description: Lambda functions should have X-Ray tracing enabled
results.impact: Without full tracing enabled it is difficult to trace the flow of logs
results.resolution: Enable tracing
results.description: Function does not have tracing enabled.

results.rule_description: Neptune logs export should be enabled
results.impact: Limited visibility of audit trail for changes to Neptune
results.resolution: Enable export logs
results.description: Cluster does not have audit logging enabled.

results.rule_description: Neptune storage must be encrypted at rest
results.impact: Unencrypted sensitive data is vulnerable to compromise.
results.resolution: Enable encryption of Neptune storage
results.description: Cluster does not have storage encryption enabled.

results.rule_description: Neptune encryption should use Customer Managed Keys
results.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
results.resolution: Enable encryption using customer managed keys
results.description: Cluster does not encrypt data with a customer managed key.

results.rule_description: RDS Deletion Protection Disabled
results.resolution: Modify the RDS instances to enable deletion protection.
results.description: Instance does not have Deletion Protection enabled

results.rule_description: RDS IAM Database Authentication Disabled
results.resolution: Modify the PostgreSQL and MySQL type RDS instances to enable IAM database authentication.
results.description: Instance does not have IAM Authentication enabled

results.rule_description: Enable Performance Insights to detect potential problems
results.impact: Without adequate monitoring, performance related issues may go unreported and potentially lead to compromise.
results.resolution: Enable performance insights
results.description: Instance does not have performance insights enabled.

results.impact: Anonymous HTTP requests will be accepted
results.resolution: Enable authentication to prevent anonymous request being accepted
results.description: App service does not have authentication enabled.

results.rule_description: Web App uses the latest HTTP version
results.impact: Outdated versions of HTTP has security vulnerabilities
results.resolution: Use the latest version of HTTP
results.description: App service does not have HTTP/2 enabled.

results.impact: Outdated versions of HTTP has security vulnerabilities

results.rule_description: Web App accepts incoming client certificate
results.impact: Mutual TLS is not being used

results.description: App service does not have client certificates enabled.

results.impact: Mutual TLS is not being used

results.description: App service does not require a secure TLS version.

results.rule_description: Password authentication should be disabled on Azure virtual machines
results.impact: Using password authentication is less secure that ssh keys may result in compromised servers
results.resolution: Use ssh authentication for virtual machines
results.description: Linux virtual machine allows password authentication.

results.rule_description: Enable disk encryption on managed disk
results.impact: Data could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Enable encryption on managed disks
results.description: Managed disk is not encrypted.

results.rule_description: Ensure AKS cluster has Network Policy configured
results.impact: No network policy is protecting the AKS cluster
results.resolution: Configure a network policy
results.description: Kubernetes cluster does not have a network policy set.

results.rule_description: Ensure AKS has an API Server Authorized IP Ranges enabled
results.impact: Any IP can interact with the API server
results.resolution: Limit the access to the API server to a limited IP range
results.description: Cluster does not limit API access to specific IP addresses.

results.rule_description: Ensure AKS logging to Azure Monitoring is Configured
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for AKS
results.description: Cluster does not have logging enabled via OMS Agent.

results.rule_description: Ensure RBAC is enabled on AKS clusters
results.impact: No role based access control is in place for the AKS cluster
results.resolution: Enable RBAC
results.description: Cluster has RBAC disabled

results.impact: No visibility of successful connections
results.resolution: Enable connection logging
results.description: Database server is not configured to log connections.

results.rule_description: At least one email address is set for threat alerts
results.impact: Nobody will be prompty alerted in the case of a threat being detected
results.resolution: Provide at least one email address for threat alerts
results.description: Security alert policy does not include any email addresses for notification.

results.rule_description: At least one email address is set for threat alerts
results.impact: Nobody will be prompty alerted in the case of a threat being detected
results.resolution: Provide at least one email address for threat alerts
results.description: Security alert policy does not include any email addresses for notification.

results.rule_description: Security threat alerts go to subcription owners and co-administrators
results.impact: Administrators and subscription owners may have a delayed response
results.resolution: Enable email to subscription owners
results.description: Security alert policy does not alert account admins.

results.rule_description: Key vault Secret should have a content type set
results.impact: The secret's type is unclear without a content type
results.resolution: Provide content type for secrets to aid interpretation on retrieval
results.description: Secret does not have a content-type specified.

results.rule_description: Ensure that the expiration date is set on all keys
results.impact: Long life keys increase the attack surface when compromised
results.resolution: Set an expiration date on the vault key
results.description: Key should have an expiry date specified.

results.rule_description: Key Vault Secret should have an expiration date set
results.impact: Long life secrets increase the opportunity for compromise
results.resolution: Set an expiry for secrets
results.description: Secret should have an expiry date specified.

results.rule_description: Key vault should have purge protection enabled
results.impact: Keys could be purged from the vault without protection
results.resolution: Enable purge protection for key vaults
results.description: Vault does not have purge protection enabled.

results.rule_description: Key vault should have the network acl block specified
results.impact: Without a network ACL the key vault is freely accessible
results.resolution: Set a network ACL for the key vault
results.description: Vault network ACL does not block access by default.

results.rule_description: Ensure the activity retention log is set to at least a year
results.impact: Short life activity logs can lead to missing records when investigating a breach
results.resolution: Set a retention period that will allow for delayed investigation
results.description: Profile has a log retention policy of less than 1 year.

results.rule_description: Ensure log profile captures all activities
results.impact: Log profile must capture all activity to be able to ensure that all relevant information possible is available for an investigation
results.resolution: Configure log profile to capture all activities
results.description: Log profile does not require the 'Delete' category.

results.rule_description: Ensure log profile captures all activities
results.impact: Log profile must capture all activity to be able to ensure that all relevant information possible is available for an investigation
results.resolution: Configure log profile to capture all activities
results.description: Log profile does not require the 'Write' category.

results.rule_description: Ensure activitys are captured for all locations
results.impact: Activity may be occurring in locations that aren't being monitored
results.resolution: Enable capture for all locations
results.description: Log profile does not log to all regions (68 regions missing).

results.rule_description: RDP access should not be accessible from the Internet, should be blocked on port 3389
results.impact: Anyone from the internet can potentially RDP onto an instance
results.resolution: Block RDP port from internet
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress to RDP port from multiple public internet addresses.

results.rule_description: An inbound network security rule allows traffic from /0.
results.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress from public internet.

results.rule_description: An inbound network security rule allows traffic from /0.
results.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress from public internet.

results.rule_description: Retention policy for flow logs should be enabled and set to greater than 90 days
results.impact: Not enabling retention or having short expiry on flow logs could lead to compromise being undetected limiting time for analysis
results.resolution: Ensure flow log retention is turned on with an expiry of >90 days
results.description: Flow log does not enable the log retention policy.

results.rule_description: SSH access should not be accessible from the Internet, should be blocked on port 22
results.impact: Its dangerous to allow SSH access from the internet
results.resolution: Block port 22 access from the internet
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress to SSH port from multiple public internet addresses.

results.rule_description: Send notification emails for high severity alerts
results.impact: The ability to react to high severity notifications could be delayed
results.resolution: Set alert notifications to be on
results.description: Security contact has alert notifications disabled.

results.rule_description: Enable the standard security center subscription tier
results.impact: Using free subscription does not enable Azure Defender for the resource type
results.resolution: Enable standard subscription tier to benefit from Azure Defender
results.description: Security center subscription uses the free tier.

results.rule_description: The required contact details should be set for security center
results.impact: Without a telephone number set, Azure support can't contact
results.resolution: Set a telephone number for security center contact
results.description: Security contact does not have a phone number listed.

results.rule_description: Trusted Microsoft Services should have bypass access to Storage accounts
results.impact: Trusted Microsoft Services won't be able to access storage account unless rules set to allow
results.resolution: Allow Trusted Microsoft Services to bypass
results.description: Network rules do not allow bypass for Microsoft Services.

results.rule_description: The minimum TLS version for Storage Accounts should be TLS1_2
results.impact: The TLS version being outdated and has known vulnerabilities
results.resolution: Use a more recent TLS/SSL policy for the load balancer
results.description: Storage account uses an insecure TLS version.

results.rule_description: The minimum TLS version for Storage Accounts should be TLS1_2
results.impact: The TLS version being outdated and has known vulnerabilities
results.resolution: Use a more recent TLS/SSL policy for the load balancer
results.description: Storage account uses an insecure TLS version.

results.rule_description: BigQuery datasets should only be accessible within the organisation
results.impact: Exposure of sensitive data to the public iniernet
results.resolution: Configure access permissions with higher granularity
results.description: Dataset grants access to all authenticated GCP users.

results.rule_description: Disks should be encrypted with customer managed encryption keys
results.impact: Using unmanaged keys does not allow for proper key management.
results.resolution: Use managed keys to encrypt disks.
results.description: Disk is not encrypted with a customer managed key.

results.rule_description: Instances should have Shielded VM integrity monitoring enabled
results.impact: No visibility of VM instance boot state.
results.resolution: Enable Shielded VM Integrity Monitoring
results.description: Instance does not have shielded VM integrity monitoring enabled.

results.rule_description: Instances should have Shielded VM VTPM enabled
results.impact: Unable to prevent unwanted system state modification
results.resolution: Enable Shielded VM VTPM
results.description: Instance does not have VTPM for shielded VMs enabled.

results.rule_description: VPC flow logs should be enabled for all subnetworks
results.impact: Limited auditing capability and awareness
results.resolution: Enable VPC flow logs
results.description: Subnetwork does not have VPC flow logs enabled.

results.rule_description: Instances should not have IP forwarding enabled
results.impact: Instance can send/receive packets without the explicit instance address
results.resolution: Disable IP forwarding
results.description: Instance has IP forwarding allowed.

results.rule_description: Instances should not override the project setting for OS Login
results.impact: Access via SSH key cannot be revoked automatically when an IAM user is removed.
results.resolution: Enable OS Login at project level and remove instance-level overrides
results.description: Instance has OS Login disabled.

results.rule_description: Disable project-wide SSH keys for all instances
results.impact: Compromise of a single key pair compromises all instances
results.resolution: Disable project-wide SSH keys
results.description: Instance allows use of project-level SSH keys.

results.rule_description: An inbound firewall rule allows traffic from /0.
results.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Firewall rule allows ingress traffic from multiple addresses on the public internet.

results.rule_description: Instances should not have public IP addresses
results.impact: Direct exposure of an instance to the public internet
results.resolution: Remove public IP
results.description: Instance has a public IP allocated.

results.rule_description: Disable serial port connectivity for all instances
results.impact: Unrestricted network access to the serial console of the instance
results.resolution: Disable serial port access
results.description: Instance has serial port enabled.

results.rule_description: VM disks should be encrypted with Customer Supplied Encryption Keys
results.impact: Using unmanaged keys does not allow for proper management
results.resolution: Use managed keys
results.description: Instance disk encryption does not use a customer managed key.

results.rule_description: Kubernetes should have 'Automatic repair' enabled
results.impact: Failing nodes will require manual repair.
results.resolution: Enable automatic repair
results.description: Node pool does not have auto-repair enabled.

results.rule_description: Kubernetes should have 'Automatic upgrade' enabled
results.impact: Nodes will need the cluster master version manually updating
results.resolution: Enable automatic upgrades
results.description: Node pool does not have auto-upgraade enabled.

results.rule_description: Clusters should have IP aliasing enabled
results.impact: Nodes need a NAT gateway to access local services
results.resolution: Enable IP aliasing
results.description: Cluster has IP aliasing disabled.

results.rule_description: Network Policy should be enabled on GKE clusters
results.impact: Unrestricted inter-cluster communication
results.resolution: Enable network policy
results.description: Cluster does not have a network policy enabled.

results.rule_description: Clusters should be set to private
results.impact: Nodes may be exposed to the public internet
results.resolution: Enable private cluster
results.description: Cluster does not have private nodes.

results.rule_description: Stackdriver Logging should be enabled
results.impact: Visibility will be reduced
results.resolution: Enable StackDriver logging
results.description: Cluster does not use the logging.googleapis.com/kubernetes StackDriver logging service.

results.rule_description: Stackdriver Monitoring should be enabled
results.impact: Visibility will be reduced
results.resolution: Enable StackDriver monitoring
results.description: Cluster does not use the monitoring.googleapis.com/kubernetes StackDriver monitoring service.

results.rule_description: Pod security policy enforcement not defined.
results.impact: Pods could be operating with more permissions than required to be effective
results.resolution: Use security policies for pods to restrict permissions to those needed to be effective
results.description: Cluster pod security policy is not enforced.

results.rule_description: Legacy metadata endpoints enabled.
results.impact: Legacy metadata endpoints don't require metadata headers
results.resolution: Disable legacy metadata endpoints
results.description: Cluster has legacy metadata endpoints enabled.

results.rule_description: GKE Control Plane should not be publicly accessible
results.impact: GKE control plane exposed to public internet
results.resolution: Use private nodes and master authorised networks to prevent exposure
results.description: Cluster exposes control plane to the public internet.

results.rule_description: Node metadata value disables metadata concealment.
results.impact: Metadata that isn't concealed potentially risks leakage of sensitive data
results.resolution: Set node metadata to SECURE or GKE_METADATA_SERVER
results.description: Cluster exposes node metadata of pools by default.

results.rule_description: Node metadata value disables metadata concealment.
results.impact: Metadata that isn't concealed potentially risks leakage of sensitive data
results.resolution: Set node metadata to SECURE or GKE_METADATA_SERVER
results.description: Node pool exposes node metadata.

results.rule_description: Ensure Container-Optimized OS (cos) is used for Kubernetes Engine Clusters Node image
results.impact: COS is the recommended OS image to use on cluster nodes
results.resolution: Use the COS image type
results.description: Cluster is not configuring node pools to use the COS containerd image type by default.

results.rule_description: Ensure Container-Optimized OS (cos) is used for Kubernetes Engine Clusters Node image
results.impact: COS is the recommended OS image to use on cluster nodes
results.resolution: Use the COS image type
results.description: Node pool is not using the COS containerd image type.

results.rule_description: Clusters should be configured with Labels
results.impact: Asset management can be limited/more difficult
results.resolution: Set cluster resource labels
results.description: Cluster does not use GCE resource labels.

results.rule_description: Legacy ABAC permissions are enabled.
results.impact: ABAC permissions are less secure than RBAC permissions
results.resolution: Switch to using RBAC permissions
results.description: Cluster has legacy ABAC enabled.

results.rule_description: Checks for service account defined for GKE nodes
results.impact: Service accounts with wide permissions can increase the risk of compromise
results.resolution: Use limited permissions for service accounts to be effective
results.description: Node pool does not override the default service account.

results.rule_description: Enable automated backups to recover from data-loss
results.impact: No recovery of lost or corrupted data
results.resolution: Enable automated backups
results.description: Database instance does not have backups enabled.

results.rule_description: Temporary file logging should be enabled for all temporary files.
results.impact: Use of temporary files will not be logged
results.resolution: Enable temporary file logging for all files
results.description: Database instance has temporary file logging disabled.

results.rule_description: SSL connections to a SQL database instance should be enforced.
results.impact: Intercepted data can be read in transit
results.resolution: Enforce SSL for all connections
results.description: Database instance does not require TLS for all connections.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud SQL Database Instances are not publicly exposed
results.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data
results.resolution: Remove public access from database instances
results.description: Database instance is granted a public internet address.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud SQL Database Instances are not publicly exposed
results.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data
results.resolution: Remove public access from database instances
results.description: Database instance allows access from the public internet.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of checkpoints is enabled.
results.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
results.resolution: Enable checkpoints logging.
results.description: Database instance is not configured to log checkpoints.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of connections is enabled.
results.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
results.resolution: Enable connection logging.
results.description: Database instance is not configured to log connections.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of disconnections is enabled.
results.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
results.resolution: Enable disconnection logging.
results.description: Database instance is not configured to log disconnections.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of lock waits is enabled.
results.impact: Issues leading to denial of service may not be identified.
results.resolution: Enable lock wait logging.
results.description: Database instance is not configured to log lock waits.

results.rule_description: Cloud Storage buckets should be encrypted with a customer-managed key.
results.impact: Using unmanaged keys does not allow for proper key management.
results.resolution: Encrypt Cloud Storage buckets using customer-managed keys.
results.description: Storage bucket encryption does not use a customer-managed key.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud Storage buckets have uniform bucket-level access enabled
results.impact: ACLs are difficult to manage and often lead to incorrect/unintended configurations.
results.resolution: Enable uniform bucket level access to provide a uniform permissioning system.
results.description: Bucket has uniform bucket level access disabled.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud Storage bucket is not anonymously or publicly accessible.
results.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data.
results.resolution: Restrict public access to the bucket.
results.description: Bucket allows public access.
